data.title: Tuition — The Foundation House
data.text:
The Foundation House LLC Tuition & Policies

• Monthly payments are due on the 1st of each month. Payments remain the same regardless of number of classes per month, school closings, holidays, and/or attendance. There are NINE tuition payments in total for the 2021/2022 Season.

There will be no credits or refunds for lessons missed.

First month’s tuition is due at the time of registration (nonrefundable) along with a $25 registration fee (Includes group class photos in Showcase Program + Showcase Performance Fee).

There is a 3-day grace period for all tuition payments. Late payments are subject to a $5 per week late payment fee.

If late payments exceed three weeks, your dancer will be asked to sit and observe class(es).

If tuition is paid in full for the entire year, the final month’s (#9) tuition payment will be 50% off.

Payment options at FH include: Cash, Check (The Foundation House LLC), Zelle® (Chase Quickpay) and Venmo (@Bianca-FH).

Returned checks are subject to a $35 return fee. Once a check bounces, all other payments must be made in cash from the given payee.

2021/2022 IMPORTANT DATES:
